title: Steering & Suspension
description: Install steering column, linkages, and complete suspension assembly.

steps.title: Steering Column Installation
steps.instructions: Install steering column and secure with proper fasteners. Check for smooth rotation.

safetyWarnings.text: Ensure steering column is properly aligned.

knowledgeChecks.question: Why is steering column alignment critical?
knowledgeChecks.explanation: Proper alignment ensures smooth, safe steering operation.
